name: Traveling Dice
description:
Never worry about not having dice. Get Traveling Dice and play anytime, anywhere.

•Conveniently play any dice game with Traveling Dice.

ADD dice with a single tap to play a different game.

CHOOSE between glow, transparent, chrome, or plastic dice.

FIND endless dice all in one place.

EXPERIENCE easy reading with large numerals and high contrast.

•Traveling Dice outshine real dice.

MUTE the sound for games in quiet places.

SELECT your dice and they stay put, eliminating accidental rolls and re-rolls.

ENJOY the realistic look, sound, and roll of actual dice anytime and anywhere.

Traveling Dice are stunning. Car photography techniques make the dice shine. Glow dice tint surrounding dice, creating subtle color mixes. Chrome and transparent dice are accented with background color.

Traveling Dice are always with you. Get Traveling Dice and play anytime, anywhere.
